attributes.action: A knighthood for Alun Wyn Jones for his services to the World Rugby community
attributes.background: Alun Wyn Jones deserves to be recognised for his services, commitment and dedication to the sport not just in Wales  but as a true embassador on a world stage

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because it asks for someone to be nominated for an honour. 

Members of the public can nominate people for honours directly. You can find out how to nominate someone for an honour here:

https://www.gov.uk/honours
